name: FO_HX_INFO
description: This table stores the information for each filing order history record.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the Filing Order History record.

columns.name: RECORD_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the record status (hidden, soft-deleted, etc...)

columns.name: RECORD_CREATION_DT
columns.description: Stores the date the record was created
